Package com.adobe.acrobat

Interface Summary
RenderingObserver This is a callback interface.
ViewerCommand This interface defines the names of the commands that could be used as an argument to the Viewer.execMenuItem method.
 

Class Summary
PDFBookmark A PDFBookmark corresponds to the PDF Outline (also called bookmark) structure.
PDFDocument Beans-level interface to a ui-less PDF document.
Viewer Viewer is the primary exported class for the Acrobat Viewer.
ViewerBeanInfo This is the information file for the Viewer bean.
